The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 22 October is 4,717 (546 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 October, there were 420 new confirmed cases (48.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 October, there were 378 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% ( 42 extra cases).
